DOC.brief_summary: The objective of the current study is to investigate relative bioavailability of bromhexine hydrochloride given as granules and syrup
DOC.brief_title: Relative Bioavailability of Bromhexine Given as Granules and Syrup in Healthy Volunteers (Clinical Phase I Study)
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: Healthy male and female volunteers Exclusion criteria: Any relevant deviation from healthy conditions
